Amit Nayar
Vice President of Technology at ConsumerTrack, Inc.
April 9, 2016, Amit worked with Dolph in different groups

Dolph is an excellent recruiter, one of the best I've worked with. He is tenacious at sourcing candidates and is great about seeing the whole hiring process through until the final hire decision. Dolph is to recruiting what a "Full Stack Engineer" is to engineering. He can work the "front end" by sourcing candidates amazingly. But it doesn't end there, he's equally great at the "back end" of the interview and hiring process treating candidates with white glove service and working extremely well with our hiring managers. Dolph represents the perfect balance of agency recruiting tenacity mixed with internal recruiting personal investment in the process and success for the organization. I highly recommend Dolph.

Dolph was my first contact at Media Temple, and immediately I could tell he loved the company and loved what he did. He provided an in-depth, honest look into the company, and really piqued my interest in working at Media Temple. He was extremely knowledgable about the ins-and-outs, and either had an immediate answer to any question I asked, or followed up quickly when he found an answer. He was incredibly thorough with his vetting of me, which made me feel great about the people I was potentially going to be (and am now) working with. Since I began working at (mt), Dolph has been a crucial in filling vacancies on my team, and throughout the company, with great people. We've never doubted a new candidate once they made it through his initial rounds.

summary: Strategic, innovative and focused staffing professional with strong experience in full life cycle recruiting. From the complex algorithms of Wall St. to the start-up environment of Silicon Beach I've mastered my environment. Exceptional ability to build relationships, partner with management teams, and influence and coach on key initiatives.Specialties: Delivering the undeliverable, conceptualizing corporate vision, outsmarting Rubik's cubes, and grilling a mean surf & turf.If you're currently spending your time architecting, designing, developing, testing or managing web services related applications and platforms we should connect!
